section.title: About
section.p: Bugzilla is a CGI-based bug tracking system that is part of the Mozilla distribution. It has a web-based front end for submitting bugs and querying the bug database.
The bugzilla URL for Tyrex and other ExoLab projects is located here.

Once you're at the front page you are presented with options to submit a bug or query the database or take some other action. Whenever you are asked for the project always select Tyrex to get the Tyrex related bugs.

section.title: Submitting a Bug
section.p: To submit a bug click here. Once the page is displayed enter the appropriate details and then press submit. Ensure that you have entered a valid email address for the assigned field. When the bug has been submitted it is committed to the database and the assigned person is notified, through email, of the new bug
